titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a feasibility study on the inclusion in Biscayne National Park, Florida, of the archaeological site know as the Miami Circle.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.
Referred to Department of the Interior for comments.

bill.summary: 7/19/1999--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Director of the National Park Service, to study and report to Congress on the feasibility of including the Miami Circle (an ancient Tequesta Indian ceremonial site) in Biscayne National Park in Florida. Authorizes appropriations.
